name: Free Tier
description:
Available via Genie's free mode!

Tokens per month: 0

Note: No reset options are available for this tier.

name: 7-Day Trial
description:
Experience the full capabilities of our AI platform with a 7-day trial.

Features:
- Complete access to the Deminji Suite
- All AI models unlocked
- Unlimited video summarization
- Integration with our exclusive Discord community
- 24/7 support for immediate assistance

Ideal for:
- New AI enthusiasts
- Short-term research projects
- Exploring our AI platform
- Testing our comprehensive tools

name: Monthly Access
description:
Unlock premium AI capabilities with a monthly subscription.

Features:
- 30 days of comprehensive, unrestricted access
- Full access to the Deminji Suite with advanced tools
- All AI models unlocked for complete mastery
- Advanced video summarization for enhanced productivity
- Integration with our exclusive Discord community
- 24/7 premium support for continuous assistance

Tailored for:
- Long-term research projects
- Academic scholars & researchers
- Continuous learning environments & innovation
- Professionals seeking maximum flexibility and AI expertise

name: Designer Access
description:
Unlock advanced design capabilities with our Designer plan.

Features:
- Access to exclusive design tools and templates
- Priority support for design-related queries
- Integration with popular design software
- Community forum for designers

Tailored for:
- Graphic designers and UI/UX professionals
- Creative agencies and design studios
- Individuals focused on visual content creation

Tokens per month: 500,000

Reset Options:
– Light Reset (25%): 125,000 tokens
– Half Reset (50%): 250,000 tokens
– Boost Reset (75%): 375,000 tokens
– Full Reset (100%): 500,000 tokens

name: Advance Access
description:
Unlock unlimited API access with our Advance plan.

Features:
- Unlimited API calls for full flexibility
- Priority support during business hours
- Access to advanced API endpoints
- Integration with Discord developer community

Tailored for:
- Growing projects ready for production
- Freelancers & small teams needing reliability

Tokens per month: 1,000,000

Reset Options:
– Light Reset (25%): 250,000 tokens
– Half Reset (50%): 500,000 tokens
– Boost Reset (75%): 750,000 tokens
– Full Reset (100%): 1,000,000 tokens

name: Enterprise Access
description:
Enterprise-grade unlimited API access for mission-critical applications.

Features:
- Unlimited API calls with high throughput
- SLA-backed support & uptime guarantees
- Dedicated account manager
- Enhanced security compliance controls

Tailored for:
- Large businesses & enterprise teams
- Applications in production with scale requirements
- Organizations needing compliance, reliability, and support

Tokens per month: 1,500,000

Reset Options:
– Light Reset (25%): 375,000 tokens
– Half Reset (50%): 750,000 tokens
– Boost Reset (75%): 1,125,000 tokens
– Full Reset (100%): 1,500,000 tokens

name: Partner Access
description:
Strategic unlimited API access & co‑development partnership.

Features:

- Technical integration planning & priority engineering access

Tailored for:

name: All Access
description:
Comprehensive access to all Bytarch AI/Bytarch LLC platforms, including Genie, Sky, Genie Extension, and Genie Suite.
